Ref: CXP126/2025

To undertake and be responsible for all mechanical maintenance and fabrication work as directed by the Field Service Engineer.
standards.Field Services in Water and Waste-Water Industry
Salary: R16 500 TCTC
Location: Durban

Criteria:
Matric/ Grade 12 and Trade Tested Fitter
3 – 5 years proven experience as a Fitter artisan.
Ability to process specific tasks and outcome within an ERP system
Be prepared to work shifts, do standby duties, callouts, and work overtime
Ability to work at heights and in confined spaces.
Computer literate (Google sheet/Excel, Google docs/Word)
Valid driver’s licence.
Be available for 24-hour rotational stand-by duties.

Apply via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
